name: BLUE ORIGIN LLC
sampleDescriptions: Assist client with aerospace policy and government relations issues.
Assist client with aerospace policies and regulations, including other governmental relations issues.
Assist client with aerospace regulations and policies, as well as other government relations issues.

H.R. 7776, the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) for Fiscal Year 2023 (FY23); and H.R. 2617, 2023 Consolidated Appropriations Act; specifically, provisions related to commercial, civil, and human spaceflight.
Fiscal Year 2025 Appropriations Acts; specifically, all provisions related to funding for spaceflight and related space programs.

H.R. 8070 and S. 4638, the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025 (NDAA); H.R. 8774 and S. 4921, the Defense Appropriations bill; all provisions related to funding for spaceflight and related space programs.
FY 2025 and FY 2026 appropriations legislation and implementation, provisions related to funding for spaceflight and related space programs.
FY 2025 and FY 2026 appropriations legislation and implementation, provisions related to funding for spaceflight and related space programs, including HR 5342 and S 2354.
